title: Statistics from the Static and Dynamic analysis of more than 14,000 APKs from Play Store

content.raw: <![CDATA[ A presentation of the statistics from an analysis of more than 14,000 APKs, as part of an experiment. ]>

analysis.summary: The article presents statistics from the static and dynamic analysis of over 14,000 APKs from the Play Store, providing insights into mobile malware trends and vulnerabilities.
ttps: Static and dynamic analysis of mobile applications
Identification of malware and vulnerabilities in mobile apps
